Game.Name: Jackie Chan Adventures - Legend of the Darkhand (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: Side-scrolling brawler, reminiscent of Double Dragon or Final Fight. Players take control of Jackie Chan and kick and punch their way through ten levels utilizing a wide range of attacks. Levels include a several pickups which may be wielded as weapons including umbrellas, baseball bats and more.http://www.mobygames.com/game/gameboy-advance/jackie-chan-adventures-legend-of-the-dark-handCheat: Every stage and scrollAt the black screen that says ''Press Start'', hold down ''R'' and tap B, A, Left, Down, Up, Right, and choose your level and scrolls.Cheat: Every stage and scrollAt the title screen, hold R and press B, A, Left, Down, Up, Right.Cheat: Every stage and scrollAt the Title Screen press one of the following button combinations.You will hear a sound effect with each correct entry.
Game.Notes: Are you Chan enough? As Jackie Chan, martial arts master and expert archeologist, you have | to take a quest around the world to defeat the evil Dark Hand organization. Their sinister demons seek to enter the earthly realm and it's up to you and your cunning wit, martial arts skill and magical scrolls to stop them in their tracks.
